column1: 2257|22.57|There they stopped engines and lay side by side upon the water for a few minutes
column2: perhaps five miles from the fishing fleet
column3: and between them and Douarnenez. At 22.57 they started up main engines and turned to do their stuff.

column1: 2257|just about eleven o’clock|Then it grew dark; she would have had them to bed
column2: but they begged sadly to be allowed to stay up; and
